data.title: How to calculate shapley values from scratch
data.description: The shapley value is a popular and useful method to explain machine learning models. The shapley value of a feature is the average contribution of a feature value to the prediction. In this article I’ll show you how to compute shapley values from scratch.

data.title: Perceiver AR: general-purpose, long-context autoregressive generation
data.description: We develop Perceiver AR, an autoregressive, modality-agnostic architecture which uses cross-attention to map long-range inputs to a small number of latents while also maintaining end-to-end causal masking. Perceiver AR can directly attend to over a hundred thousand tokens, enabling practical long-context density estimation without the need for hand-crafted sparsity patterns or memory mechanisms.
